turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey assistant I think I would like to get a coffee drink from Peets. Can you help?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, i can definitely help with that. What do you want from Peets?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking an Iced latte will do the trick

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, great! What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to go for a large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It comes with your choice of milk as well. What kind do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: do they have Soy as an option?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, they have soy. Is that what you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, either that or 2% milk since I am watching my weight.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have 2% as well

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, cool. Lets make it a large iced latte with 2% milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll get right on it. Oh, I forgot to tell you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: tell me what?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you can get it flavored as well. Would you like to add that to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I can get the flacoring with 2%?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, of course!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, yeah. Add the vanilla flavoring to the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you read the order back to me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 large iced latte with 2% milk and vanilla flavoring

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: See you soon with the order.
